publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1038 Rhona Brankin: Newbattle Abbey College - 70 Years of Success for Scotland’s National Adult Education College—That the Parliament congratulates Newbattle Abbey College on its 70th anniversary as Scotland’s national adult education college and recognises the commitment of the college staff and partners throughout the years which have helped many students to transform their lives and to open new opportunities which truly make Newbattle Abbey College Scotland’s life-changing college.

S3M-1038 Rhona Brankin: Newbattle Abbey College - 70 Years of Success for Scotland’s National Adult Education College—That the Parliament congratulates Newbattle Abbey College on its 70th anniversary as Scotland’s national adult education college and recognises the commitment of the college staff and partners throughout the years which have helped many students to transform their lives and to open new opportunities which truly make Newbattle Abbey College Scotland’s life-changing college.
S3M-1038 Newbattle Abbey College - 70 Years of Success for Scotland’s National Adult Education College (lodged on 13 December 2007) Sandra White*, Johann Lamont*, Jack McConnell*
